channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiProxy
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiProxy

item.title: CVE-2021-43081|2024-08-04T03:47:13.630Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortiproxy
item.description: An improper neutralization of input during web page generation vulnerability [CWE-79] in FortiOS version 7.0.3 and below, 6.4.8 and below, 6.2.10 and below, 6.0.14 to 6.0.0. and in FortiProxy version 7.0.1 and below, 2.0.7 to 2.0.0 web filter override form may allow an unauthenticated attacker to perform an XSS attack via crafted HTTP GET requests.
